enhanced_by.reason: The method createRefreshRequest(int) sets a LIFETIME attribute, which is a state dependency for the refresh request.
The method addLongTermCredentialAttributes adds attributes for long-term credential mechanism, which is often required before creating a refresh request.
The method createRefreshResponse(int) creates a response with a LIFETIME attribute, similar to the refresh request created by createRefreshRequest(int).
The method createRefreshErrorResponse(char) handles errors related to refresh requests, which can inform the construction of assertions for createRefreshRequest.
